scripts.folder:make: shx mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/bundle && shx cp src/*.* dist/ && shx cp -r src/static dist/
scripts.folder: npm run folder:clean -s && npm run folder:make -s
scripts.plugins:p1: shx mkdir dist/css/p1 && shx touch dist/css/p1/p1.css
scripts.plugins:p2: shx mkdir dist/css/p2 && shx touch dist/css/p2/p2.css
scripts.plugins: npm run plugins:p1 -s & npm run plugins:p2 -s
scripts.js: browserify src/js/app.js -t [ babelify ] -d | exorcist dist/js/app.js.map > dist/js/app.js
scripts.postjs: uglifyjs dist/js/app.js -m -o dist/js/app.min.js --in-source-map dist/js/app.js.map --source-map dist/js/app.min.js.map --source-map-url app.min.js.map --source-map-root app/js
scripts.build:dev: npm run folder -s && npm run plugins -s && npm run css -s && npm run js -s
scripts.watch:css: chokidar 'src/less' -c 'npm run css && echo $(tput setaf 2)css done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch:js: chokidar 'src/js' -c 'npm run js && echo $(tput setaf 2)js done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch:static: chokidar 'src/*.*' 'src/static' -c 'shx cp -ru src/*.* src/static dist/ && echo $(tput setaf 2)static done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css -s & npm run watch:js -s & npm run watch:static -s
scripts.env:dev: npm run build:dev -s && ( npm run watch -s & npm run server:dev -s )
scripts.prod:css: npm run _tmp:p1 -s && npm run _tmp:p2 -s && npm run _tmp:app -s
scripts.postprod:css: shx cat dist/tmp/*.css | cleancss -o dist/bundle/bundle.min.css --s0 && shx rm -r dist/tmp/
scripts.build:prod: npm run prod:css -s && npm run prod:js -s && npm run prod:index -s
scripts.build: npm run build:dev -s && npm run build:prod -s
scripts.env:prod: npm run build -s && npm run server:prod -s
